definition: to force/to compel/to approach or go towards/urgent/pressing
to do harm to/to cause trouble to/harm/evil/calamity

sentences.english: A lot of them were persecuted and tortured to death by their political opponents.
sentences.chinese: 許多人被他們的政敵迫害致死。

sentences.english: Professor: Why we think Rome was persecuting Christians?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼我們會認爲羅馬在迫害基督徒？

sentences.english: Some officials kept silent because they were afraid of being persecuted by Zhao Gao.
sentences.chinese: 有的大臣害怕遭到趙高的迫害，於是保持沉默。

sentences.english: Theism is harmful to society, as it leads to intolerance and persecution.
sentences.chinese: 有神論，是對社會有害，因爲它會導致不寬容和迫害。

sentences.english: Describes in World War II the movie which persecutes to the Jew.
sentences.chinese: 一部描述二戰中對猶太人迫害的影片。

sentences.english: You Majesty, Li Yifu often abuses his power to persecute his opponents.
sentences.chinese: 皇上，李義府他經常利用手中的權力迫害反對他的人。

sentences.english: We have had great trials and great persecutions.
sentences.chinese: 我們經受了巨大的考驗與迫害。

sentences.english: The dissidents went abroad to escape political persecution.
sentences.chinese: 持異議者去了海外以逃避政治迫害。

sentences.english: Hitler's undisguised effort to persecute the Jews met with worldwide condemnation.
sentences.chinese: 希特勒對猶太人的露骨迫害行爲受到全世界的譴責。

sentences.english: Pray that God will break the stronghold of persecution and corruption in China.
sentences.chinese: 禱告神會打破中國迫害及腐敗的堅固營壘。

sentences.english: Blessed are those who are persecuted in the cause of uprightness.
sentences.chinese: 爲義而受迫害的人是有福的。

sentences.english: In the end, none of these officials could escape persecution by Zhao Gao.
sentences.chinese: 最終，所有說真話的大臣都遭到了趙高的迫害。

sentences.english: Pray the persecutors will come to the saving knowledge of Jesus Christ.
sentences.chinese: 禱告迫害者能有耶穌基督得救的智慧。

sentences.english: He said he had been cruelly hounded in the concenration camp.
sentences.chinese: 他說他在集中營曾受到殘酷的迫害。

sentences.english: Jin prince Chong'er ran away from the country with his supporters due to persecution.
sentences.chinese: 晉國公子重耳因受到迫害，率其支持者出逃。

sentences.english: Persecution is used in theology, not in arithmetic.
sentences.chinese: 神學裏面有對不同意見者的迫害，算術裏可沒有。
